# toolTip

**Instance Property**

The text to display in the tooltip.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var toolTip: String { get }
```

## Discussion

To set the tooltip text, create a tooltip configuration object using either the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIToolTipConfiguration/init(toolTip:)] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIToolTipConfiguration/init(toolTip:in:)] methods.

## Accessing the configuration settings

- **sourceRect**: The region of the view or control where the pointer must hover to trigger the appearance of the tooltip.
